=== gimp-2.6.10 ===

* needs $(GLIB_LIBS)
* libgimpthumb-$(GIMP_API_VERSION).la $(GLIB_LIBS) to libgimpthumb/Makefile.am
* dnl When linking with --as-needed, add -lm to LIBS.
	  AC_CHECK_LIB(m, log10,,)

=== Patch ===
<pre>
--- tarballs/gimp-2.6.10/libgimpthumb/Makefile.am	2010-07-02 16:51:56.000000000 -0600
+++ gimp-2.6.10/libgimpthumb/Makefile.am	2010-07-21 11:50:20.000000000 -0600
@@ -86,7 +86,7 @@
 
 gimp_thumbnail_list_SOURCES = gimp-thumbnail-list.c
 
-gimp_thumbnail_list_LDADD = libgimpthumb-$(GIMP_API_VERSION).la
+gimp_thumbnail_list_LDADD = libgimpthumb-$(GIMP_API_VERSION).la $(GLIB_LIBS)
 
 
 install-data-local: install-ms-lib install-libtool-import-lib
--- tarballs/gimp-2.6.10/configure.in	2010-07-02 16:51:55.000000000 -0600
+++ gimp-2.6.10/configure.in	2010-07-21 11:50:20.000000000 -0600
@@ -468,6 +468,8 @@
 ]))
 LIBS=$gimp_save_LIBS
 
+dnl When linking with --as-needed, add -lm to LIBS.
+AC_CHECK_LIB(m, log10,,)
 
 AC_PATH_XTRA
 
</pre>
